sentences: Sven Erik Herman Thomas Vikström (born 21 January 1969), professionally known as Thomas Vikström, is a Swedish vocalist best known for working with hard rock and heavy metal bands including doom metal bands Candlemass (during their initial final years, from 1991 to 1994) and power metallers Stormwind.
Inspired by his father, Vikström has played roles in theatre productions starting on stage at the Stockholm theatre Folkan in 1990.
During 1991 he starred as the main-character in the opera Hoffman's Adventure in Stockholm.
He also played the main part as John in the musical Miss Saigon from late 1997 to December 1998.
